sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都含有"林，树林"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: forest, woods, jungle, grove, plantation, bushes
means: forest ： 多指树木高大，面积大、人迹罕至的原始森林。
woods ： 指面积不大的树林或小块的树林。
grove ： 通常指面积较小，树木整齐，地面干净的小树林，尤指果林。

sentence.Network_en: "Orchards would take the place of the jungle," he rhapsodized.
sentence.Network_cn: “要让这片丛林成为果园，”他无比兴奋地说。

sentence.Network_en: If you make aggression pay, this becomes the law of the jungle.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你通过侵略谋取利益，这就成了弱肉强食。

sentence.Network_en: It held more mystery than even the darkest jungle.
sentence.Network_cn: 它甚至比最黑暗的丛林还更令人感到神秘。

jx.jx_en_mean: the principle that those who are strong and apply ruthless self-interest will be most successful

means.word_mean: 混乱的一堆东西,错综复杂难以解决的事情

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: via Hindi from Sanskrit jāṅgala 'rough and arid (terrain')

encyclopedia.content: 单词发音 英音：['dʒʌŋgl] 美音：['dʒʌŋg!] 词典解释 名词 n. 1. 锛埲却級丛林,密林[C][U] Advance in the jungle was very slow. 在丛林中行进很慢。 2. 乱七八糟的聚会,杂乱的一堆[C] The jungle of tax laws is a headache. 繁复的税则令人头痛。 3. 生存竞争激烈残酷之处[C] He's from Chicago; he grew up in a real jungle. 他是从芝加哥来的；他从小生长在生存竞

entry.def: A jungle is a forest in a tropical country where large numbers of tall trees and plants grow very close together.

example.ex: ...the mountains and jungles of Papua New Guinea...
example.tran: 巴布亚新几内亚的山脉和丛林

example.ex: The mountain area is covered entirely in dense jungle.
example.tran: 山区完全掩映在茂密的丛林中。

entry.tran: 堆满东西的地方；杂乱无章的地方
entry.def: If you describe a place as a jungle, you are emphasizing that it is full of lots of things and very untidy.

example.ex: ...a jungle of stuffed birds, knick-knacks, potted plants.
example.tran: 堆满了鸟类标本、小摆设和盆栽植物的乱七八糟的地方

entry.tran: 复杂困难的境况；尔虞我诈的环境
entry.def: If you describe a situation as a jungle, you dislike it because it is complicated and difficult to get what you want from it.

example.ex: Social security law and procedure remain a jungle of complex rules.
example.tran: 有关社会保障的法律和程序仍旧是个充满错综复杂的规则的危险领域。

entry.tran: 丛林法则；弱肉强食的原则
entry.def: If you refer to the law of the jungle, you are referring to a situation in which there are no laws or rules to govern the way that people behave and people use force to get what they want.

example.ex: If you make aggression pay, this becomes the law of the jungle...
example.tran: 如果你通过侵略谋取利益，这就成了弱肉强食。

example.ex: The law of the jungle demands: kill or be killed.
example.tran: 丛林法则要求的是：杀戮或者被杀。

entry.tran: 丛林音乐（一种有着快节奏鼓点的舞曲）
entry.def: Jungle is a style of dance music with a fast drum beat.

means.word_mean: 2. a location marked by an intense competition and struggle for survival

sentences.cn: 在亚洲的丛林中有老虎。

sentences.cn: 这个地方已变得乱七八糟。
